s2_band01.name: coastal
s2_band01.description: Coastal aerosol band (~443nm; 60m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 1.

s2_band02.name: blue
s2_band02.description: Blue band (~494nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 2.

s2_band03.name: green
s2_band03.description: Green band (~560nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 3.

s2_band04.name: red
s2_band04.description: Red band (~665nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 4.

s2_band05.name: rededge1
s2_band05.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~704nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 5.

s2_band06.name: rededge2
s2_band06.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~740nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 6.

s2_band07.name: rededge3
s2_band07.description: Vegetation red edge (VRE) band (~781nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 7.

s2_band08.name: nir
s2_band08.description: Near infrared (NIR) band (~834nm; 10m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 8.

s2_band08A.name: nir08
s2_band08A.description: Narrow near infrared (NIR) band (~864nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 8A.

s2_band09.name: nir09
s2_band09.description: Water vapour band (~944nm; 60m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 9.

s2_band11.name: swir16
s2_band11.description: Shortwave infrared (SWIR) band (~1612nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 11.

s2_band12.name: swir22
s2_band12.description: Shortwave infrared (SWIR) band (~2195nm; 20m spatial resolution). Top of atmosphere (TOA) reflectance captured by the multi-spectral instrument (MSI) of Sentinel-2A or Sentinel-2B as band 12.

scl.name: scl
scl.description: SCL categories (as provided by Sen2Cor processor)
